description: The Afghanistan Reconstruction Trust Fund (ARTF) generates a quarterly report to Donors. This dataset represents acronyms defined in the quarterly report, and are applicable to the ARTF program as a whole.

metadata.description: The Afghanistan Reconstruction Trust Fund (ARTF) generates a quarterly report to Donors. This dataset represents acronyms defined in the quarterly report, and are applicable to the ARTF program as a whole.

name: Afghanistan Reconstruction Trust Fund Acronyms - Pilot
